name: Pathways: Slide Puzzle Game
description:
The goal of Pathways is original and unique: complete paths by sliding the tiles up or down, left or right. Each path puzzle has to be completed within a limited amount of movements. The mechanics are simple but difficulty increases with some tiles being blocked and dimensions going up to 5 by 5.

The path to solving these path puzzles will certainly keep your brain busy. Don't worry, you will start with 2 free solution hints to use anytime. This logic game may help you develop faster reasoning, memory and creativity.

Pathways contains 3 level packs (Starter, Classic and Super 3 x 3) with different challenges so you are free to choose the kind of puzzle you like the most. You will receive a star every time your solution to a puzzle is perfect, so if you want to become the Pathways guru don't forget to collect them all.

MAIN FEATURES
- More than 300 free brain puzzles
- Puzzle solution hints
- Themes: Blue, Green, Yellow, Orange, Red, Classic, and Dark
- Apple Watch version
- High quality game experience
- Simple and relaxing

Follow us to get news and updates on facebook.com/pathways.puzzle, twitter.com/PathwaysPuzzle, or instagram.com/pathways.puzzle.

Accept the challenge!
